meta.label: Replay
meta.description: Create a dataset of edited rows from the raw event log maintained by the writeback functionality ("editlog"). When the same cell was edited multiple times, the last edit is kept.

params.name: sep
params.label: ⚠️ DO NOT EDIT THIS RECIPE
params.description: This recipe is controlled by a data editing webapp (see URL in the recipe details, by clicking on the (i) icon in the vertical menu bar on the right-hand side).
